title: Comparing Hilbert depth of $I$ with Hilbert depth of $S/I$. III
authors: Andreea I. Bordianu and Mircea Cimpoeas
abstract:
Let $I$ be a squarefree monomial ideal of $S=K[x_1,\ldots,x_n]$. We prove
that if $\operatorname{hdepth}(S/I)\leq 8$ or $n\leq 10$ then
$\operatorname{hdepth}(I)\geq \operatorname{hdepth}(S/I)-1$.
